===Kurobox===
===Kurobox===
â
The product was designed by the manufacturer to accept a user supplied [[Linux]] distribution. Several<ref>www.kurobox.com: [http://www.kurobox.com/mwiki/index.php/Category:Project Projects]</ref> including a Kurobox specific distribution called Sylver, [[Debian]], [[Gentoo Linux]], and [[Fedora Core]] have been ported to it by various user groups in both the [[USA]]/[[Europe]],<ref>http://www.kurobox.com/ - The Kurobox Page</ref> and [[Japan]].<ref> http://www.kurobox.info/ - A Chinese language forum covering the Kurobox and LinkStation.</ref>
+
The product was designed by the manufacturer to accept a user supplied [[Linux]] distribution. Several<ref>www.kurobox.com: [http://www.kurobox.com/mwiki/index.php/Category:Project Projects]</ref> including a Kurobox specific distribution called Sylver, [[Debian]], [[Gentoo Linux]], and [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] have been ported to it by various user groups in both the [[USA]]/[[Europe]],<ref>http://www.kurobox.com/ - The Kurobox Page</ref> and [[Japan]].<ref> http://www.kurobox.info/ - A Chinese language forum covering the Kurobox and LinkStation.</ref>

===TeraStation===
